---
Song: pArAmal pArTHa
Film: poondhOtta kAvalkAran
---
Notes: s r2 g2 m1 p n2 S

pArAmal pArTHa nenjam cham chajam jam cham
p p m   g  s   s  s   s    s  s   s   s

pOdAmal pOtta nenjam cham chajam jam cham
p p m   g  s  s  s   s    s  s   s   s

iru pArvai adhu pAdattum
pp  n  Snp pp   n n  Snp

iru pArvai pAdattum rAgangaL
pp  n  Snp pn n Snp pnn  S

Stanza 1:
niTHirai kettadhu kaNNE en siTHirap peNNE
p p  p   m  p p   g  p  p  p n  p   m  p

muTHirai kaNdadhu munnE nee thottadhan pinnE
p p  p   m  p p   g  p  p   p   n  p   m  p

boopALam kEttEnE ponmAnai pArTHEnE 
pn n SRG RS n n  pn n SR  Sn p  p

pEsAmal nindrEnE peNNendru A..nEnE
pnn SRG RS  n n  pn n  SR  Sn p p


kattaLai ittadhum pattadhum thottadhum kaRpanai alla iLa
S  S S   S S S    S  S S    S   S S    S  G S   n S  pn

vetrilai endroru vetrilai kaNdadhu aRpudham alla 
S  S S   S  S S  S  S S   S  S S   S G S    n S

nee thottadhum suttadhu pattudai vittadhu nAnum solla
S   S   G S    n  S n   p  n p   m  p m   g m   p  S

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
melliya malligaip poovE pudhu mellisai pAdu 
valliyin mellidai mElE pudhu sangadhi pOdu
poondhEham thAngAdhu en dhEvan yEndhAdhu 
ArAdhu theerAdhu nee vandhu sErAdhu 
peNNivaL mEniyai kaNNimai moodidum kAviyam kaNdu 
nAn paNNiya puNNiyam unnudan koodidum en manam indru 
puvi maNNilum viNNilum ponkavi pAdidum dhEham ondru
